banner.title: About the information we collect
banner.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to recognize and analyze your visits, and measure traffic usage and activity. You can learn about how we use the data about your visit or information you provide reading our {link}. By clicking "I Agree", you consent to the use of cookies.
banner.text.archivalNotification: Attention: as part of the ongoing maintenance of the Tasking Manager, projects created before 2020 will be archived.

signUp.modal.authorize: Have you finished the registration on OpenStreetMap?
signUp.authorize.message: Start mapping now! Just login to the Tasking Manager with your new OpenStreetMap account.
signUp.authorize.check: Do you still need an OpenStreetMap account?
signUp.modal.title: Jisajili
signUp.proceed_osm.osm_title: Do you have an OpenStreetMap account?
signup.proceed_osm.text1: The Tasking Manager works with OpenStreetMap, a collaborative, open-source map of the world. Everything you map on the Tasking Manager is going to be available on OpenStreetMap.
signup.proceed_osm.text2: First, you'll need an account on OpenStreetMap.org in order to get started.
signup.proceed_osm.login: I already have an OpenStreetMap account
input.errors.name: Invalid name
input.placeholder.Name: Your Name
header.topBar.slogan: Kutengeneza ramani ya ulimwengu wetu pamoja
signup.modal.question: Please provide your name and email address:
emailUpdate.modal.title: Sasisha barua pepe yako
emailUpdate.modal.text1: Kabla hujaanza kuchora, tafadhali weka barua pepe yako.
emailUpdate.modal.text2: We are mapping together! Providing your email address is necessary for mapping feedback and direct messages to reach you.
emailUpdate.modal.privacy_policy: Soma sera yetu ya ufaragha kuona ni namna gani tunalinda taarifa binafsi za watumiaji wetu,
serviceWorker.dialog.newVersion: There is a new Tasking Manager version available!
home.mainSection.title: Chora ramani kwa ajili ya watu wenye uhitaji
home.mainSection.lead: Join a global community that is mapping the places most vulnerable to disaster and poverty in order to support humanitarian aid and sustainable development across the world.
home.callToAction.title: Hatuwezi kufanya hiki bila wewe
home.callToAction.firstLeadLine: Yeyote anaweza kuchangia uchoraji wa ramani. Kama hujawahi kuchora ramani kabla na ungependa kuanza kuchora leo, tembelea ukurasa {link} wetu.
home.callToAction.secondLeadLine: Je, una uzoefu na kuchora ramani? Bofya hapo chini kuanglia miradi iliyotayari kwa ajili ya kuchorwa.
home.featuredProjects.title: Miradi Iliyoangaziwa
home.stats.edits: Jumla ya Mabadiliko yaliyowekwa kwenye Ramani
home.stats.mappers: Wachoraji wa ramani wanaofanya kazi sasa.
home.mappingFlow.title: Kila mwaka, majanga ya dunia yanaua takribani watu {number} na kusababisha hasara au watu millioni 200 kupoteza makazi yao. Kuchora ramani kutasaidia kubadili hili.
home.mappingFlow.headLine: Organizations use Tasking Manager to create mapping projects for areas around the world where data is needed to help save or improve lives.
home.mappingFlow.cards.mapping.title: Kuchora ramani
home.mappingFlow.cards.validation.title: Uthibitisho
home.mappingFlow.cards.usingData.title: Kutumia taarifa
home.mappingFlow.cards.mapping.descripti: Watu wanaojitolea hutumia picha iliyopigwa kutoka angani na OpenStreetMap kuchora nyumba, barabara, na vitu vinginevyo.
home.mappingFlow.cards.validation.descri: Watu wanaojitolea wenye uzoefu huangalia taarifa za ramani kuhakikisha ipo katika ubora wa hali ya juu.
home.mappingFlow.cards.usingData.descrip: Mashirika ya kibinadamu hutumia taarifa za ramani kufanya mipango wa kukabiliana na maafa na shughuli zingine za kuokoa maisha.
home.whoIsMapping.title: Nani anatumia ramani?
home.whoIsMapping.headline: Mashirika yanayoaminika duniani hutumia Tasking Manager kupata taarifa za ramani ili kuwafikia watu wenye uhitaji.
home.whoIsMapping.contact.title: Je, shirika lako linataka kufanya kazi nasi?
home.contact.contacterHeadText: Unataka kujadiliana nasi? Au, una swali au maoni yoyote ambayo ungependa kutushirikisha? Jaza fomu hapo chini kuwasiliana na timu yetu.
home.contact.serviceDesk.description: You can also contact us through our {link}.
home.testimonials.title: Unaweza kuleta mabadiliko
home.testimonials.ifrc.citation: In the early days of the Cyclone Idai response, IFRC was looking for detailed maps to get a sense of the scale of the flooding, which were also used for search and rescue operations. Later on, we had requests to identify where certain buildings, such as health centres or hospitals, were located so our health team could assess the damage and medical needs of patients.
home.testimonials.ifrc.bio: Remote Coordinator for the IFRC Information Management Team for Cyclone Idai
foooter.definition: Tasking Manager is a platform where individuals can team up for mapping in OpenStreetMap
footer.credits: Free and Open Source Software brought to you by the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team.
notifications.mainSection.title: Taarifa

project.detail.cards.mapthroughosm.descr: Kama ni mgeni wa kuchora ramani, tunapendekeza utembelee ukurasa wetu wa mafunzo ili upate maelekezo  kabla ya kuanza kuchora.

projects.formInputs.privacy.title: Usiri
projects.formInputs.privacy.description: Binafsi inamaanisha kuwa watumiaji tu ambao ni washiriki wa timu ya mradi wanaweza kupata, kuchora au kuhalalisha mradi huu. Chaguo hili linazidi juu ya uchoraji wa ramani na uthibitisho.
projects.formInputs.teams.title: Timu
projects.formInputs.organisation.title: Taasisi
projects.formInputs.campaign.title: Kampeni
projects.formInputs.categories.title: Jamii
projects.formInputs.organisation.descrip: Shirika ambalo linaratibu mradi, ikiwa kuna lolote. Wasimamizi wa shirika hilo watakuwa na haki za usimamizi juu ya mradi huo.
projects.formInputs.permissions.level: Watumiaji walio na kiwango cha kati au cha juu tu.
projects.formInputs.permissions.teamsAnd: Washiriki wa timu wa kati na wa juu tu
Fafanua ni watumiaji gani wanaweza kuchora mradi huu.
projects.formInputs.permissions.validati: Fafanua ni watumiaji gani wanaweza kuhalalisha mradi huu.
projects.sections.mapping_validation.des: Tumia hii kama kuna sababu unayohitaji kuchora, kuthibitisha au kutokuthibitisha kazi zote kwenye mradi huu kwa mara moja.
projects.actions.message_contributors.de: Hii itatuma ujumbe kwa kila mchangiaji wa mradi wa sasa. Tafadhali tumia kipengele hiki kwa uangalifu.
projects.actions.message_contributors.tr: Ujumbe huu hautatafsiriwa kwa lugha tofauti za watumiaji, kwa hiyo unaweza kujumuisha tafsiri zako mwenyewe.
projects.actions.message_contributors.er: Imeshindikana kutuma ujumbe kwa wachangiaji wote kwa sababu isiyojulikana.
projects.actions.map_all_tasks.title: Chora kazi zote
projects.actions.map_all_tasks.confirmat: Una uhakika unataka kuziwekea alama kazi zote katika huu mradi kuwa zimeshachora? Hutoweza kutendua hili.
projects.actions.map_all_tasks.descripti: Hii itaonesha kazi zote (kasoro 'zisizokuwepo' tu) kama zilivochorwa. Tafadhali tumia hii ikiwa una uhakika wa kile unachokifanya.
projects.actions.map_all_tasks.error: Imeshindikana kuchora kazi zote kwa sababu isiyofahamika
projects.actions.invalidate_all_tasks.co: Una uhakika unataka kubatilisha kazi zote katika mradi huu? Hauwezi kutendua hii.
projects.actions.invalidate_all_tasks.de: Hii itaziwekea alama kazi zote (isipokua 'zisizokuwepo') kuwa 'zinahitaji kuchorwa zaidi'. Tafadhali tumia hii kama unahakika na unachokifanya.
projects.actions.invalidate_all_tasks.su: Kazi ziliwekwa kuonyesha kama 'uchoraji ramani zaidi unahitajika' kikamilifu.
projects.actions.invalidate_all_tasks.er: Imeshindwa kutothibitisha kazi zote kwa sababu isiyojulikana.
projects.actions.validate_all_tasks.conf: Una uhakika unataka kuthibitisha kazi zote? Hauwezi kutendua hili.
projects.actions.validate_all_tasks.desc: Hii itabadili wasifu wa kazi zote (isipokuwa 'zisizokuwepo') kuwa 'zimekamilika'. Tafadhali tumia hii kama unahakika na unachokifanya.
projects.actions.validate_all_tasks.erro: Validating all the tasks failed for an unknown reason.
projects.actions.reset_bad_imagery_tasks: Una uhakika unataka kuweka upya kazi zote zilizooneshwa kutokuwepo katika mradi huu? Hutoweza kuzirudisha.
Hii itabadilisha wasifu wa kazi zote ambazo kwenda kuwa 'tayari kwa kuchorwa'. Tafadhali itumie kama una uhakika na unachokifanya.
Kazi zilizowekwa alama ya kutokuwepo, zilifanikiwa kuwekwa upya.
Kurudisha upya kazi kumeshindikana kwa sababu isiyojulikana.
projects.actions.reset_all_tasks.title: Rudisha kazi
projects.actions.reset_all_tasks.descrip: Rudisha kazi zote kwenye mradi tayari kwa kuchora ramani, hifadhi historia
projects.actions.reset_all_tasks.error: Imeshindikana kurudisha kazi zote kwa sababu isiyofahamika
projects.actions.clone_project.descripti: Hii itanakiri maelezo, maelekezo, na taarifa zote n.k. na kuziweka katika mradi mpya. Kazi na maeneo yenye umuhimu pia yatanakiriwa. Utatakiwa kuchora upya maeneo hayo au kuyaingiza. Mradi pacha wako mpya utakua kwenye hali ya kutokamilika.
projects.actions.transfer_project.title: Hamisha umiliki wa mradi
projects.actions.transfer_project.alert: Kama umekosea kutuma, wasiliana na mmiliki mpya ili kurejesha.
projects.actions.delete_project.title: Futa mradi
projects.actions.delete_project.alert: Waweza futa mradi ambao haujachangiwa tu
projects.actions.delete_project.error: Imeshindwa kufuta mradi huu. Kama mradi huu ulipokea uchangiaji wowote, inabidi uuhifadhi.
projects.actions.task_reset.title: Anzisha upya kazi
projects.actions.task_reset.confirmation: Una uhakika unataka kuanzisha upya kazi zote? Huwezi kutendua hili.
projects.formInputs.language.select: Select a language above to translate.
projects.formInputs.random_task_selectio: Fanya iwe ya kuchagua bila mpangilio
Fanya iwe ya kuchagua bila mpangilio wakati wa kuchora
If checked, users must edit tasks at random for the initial editing stage (managers and admins are exempt).
projects.formInputs.rapid_power_user.des: If checked, RapiD will load with the power user dialog enabled.
projects.formInputs.imagery.note: Fuata huu muundo kwa ajili ya TMS URLs: {exampleUrl}
projects.formInputs.priority_areas.uploa: The supported file formats are: GeoJSON, KML, OSM or zipped Shapefile. You can drag and drop a file over the map to import it.
projects.formInputs.name: Jina la mradi
projects.formInputs.dueDate.description: Define the ideal date to have the project finished. The date format is day/month/year.
projects.formInputs.osmcha_filter_id.des: Kitambulisho cha hiari cha kichujio cha OSMCha cha kutumika wakati wa kutazama mradi kwenye OSMCha, ikiwa unataka kuchuja. Kumbuka kwamba hii inachukua nafasi ya vichujio vyote vya kawaida. Mfano: 095e8b31-b3cb-4b36-a106-02826fb6a109 (kwa usalama, unaweza pia kuweka URL ya OSMCha hapa inayotumia kichujio kilicho hifadhiwa na kitambulisho cha kichujio hicho kitatolewa kwa ajili yako).
projects.formInputs.priority_areas.descr: If you want mappers to work on the highest priority areas first, draw one or more polygons within the project area or import a file.
projects.formInputs.mapper_level.descrip: Kuweka viwango kutasaidia wachoraji kupata miradi yenye ya kiwango chake kufanyia kazi.
projects.formInputs.per_task_instruction: Ongeza habari yoyote ambayo inaweza kuwa muhimu kwa watumiaji wakati wa kuchora kazi. "{x}", "{y}" na "{z}" zitabadilishwa kwa vigezo sambamba kwa kila kazi. Vigezo vya "{x}", "{y}" na "{z}"  vinaweza kutumika tu kwenye majukumu yanayotokana na Tasking Manager  na sio kwa kazi zilizoingizwa.
Mfano: Chumba hiki kina taarifa nyingi za ziada. Bofya [hapa](http://localhost:8111/import?new_layer=true&url=http://www.domain.com/data/{x}/{y}/{z}/routes_2009.osm) kufungua taarifa kwenye JOSM.
projects.formInputs.changesetComment.des: Maoni yameongezwa kwenye mabadiliko yaliyo fanyika. Mtumiaji anatakiwa ahamasishwe kuongeza maneno yanayoelezea alicho kichora. Alama za reli zinatumika muda mwingine kwa uchambuzi badae, lakini inatakiwa kuwa inatoa maelezo kwa binadamu na isitumike sana, #kikundi #tukio kwa mfano.

user.settings.expert_mode.description: Njia ya mtaalam hufanya huduma za hali ya juu na za majaribio zipatikane. Watumiaji wengi wanapaswa kuacha hii.
user.settings.default_editor.description: Chagua mhariri wa siku zote unayetaka kumtumia wakati wa kuchora kazi. Kwa kuchagua chaguo la mara zote, hutohitaji kuchagua uhariri kila mara unapochora.
user.settings.language.description: Define your preferred language. It will also affect the language of the maps you see on Tasking Manager.
user.settings.become_validator.descripti: Wahalalishaji wanaangalia ubora wa ramani zilizo haririwa na kutoa mrejesho kwa wachoraji ili waboreshe kazi. Kama wewe ni mchoraji mwenye uzoefu, tuma maombi ya kuwa mhalalishaji.

user.notifications.projects.description: Unapata taarifa pale mradi uliochangia unapopata maendeleo.
user.notifications.task.description: Receive an email when a task you have contributed to is validated.
user.notifications.comments.description: Receive a notification every time someone posts a comment on projects or tasks you have contributed to.

user.welcome.firstProject.text3: Unaweza kuanza kuchora  kwa kuchagua moja ya miradi hapa chini, iliyopendekezwa kwa ajili yako!

taskAction.messages.error.no_locked_task: Huna kazi yoyote iliyofungwa kwa ajili ya kufanywa. Fungua Mradi #{currentProject} ili kuchagua kazi ya kuchora ramani.
EmailVerification.status.error.explanati: Uthibitisho wa barua pepe yako umeshindikana. Angalia ikiwa URL kwenye kivinjari inalingana na URL iliyotumwa kwa barua pepe yako.
EmailVerification.status.verified.explan: Asante kwa kutoa anuani yako ya barua pepe.
Kuanzia sasa, tutakua tukikupa taarifa ya namna ambavyo unaweza kuleta mabadiliko kwa kuchora ramani kwenye Tasking Manager. Unaweza kubadili namna ya kupokea taarifa hizi hapa {link}.
pages.about.title: Kuhusu
pages.about.intro: Every day, a global community works tirelessly behind the scenes to make the more complete map of the world. The resulting work is Open Data and can be used by anyone. Universal access to geospatial information is heavily changing how people use maps and what they build with them.
pages.learn.title: Jifunze
pages.learn.map.title: Learn to map
pages.learn.map.intro: Mapping in OpenStreetMap is a team effort, continually growing due to a community of hundreds of thousands of dedicated global contributors. Everybody can participate in this open map of the world, and it needs responsible people, who are open to learn and show love for the details.
pages.learn.map.description: You can start your journey now. You do not have to ask permission before adding or modifying existing data. If you believe that you can improve something, then do it. But always remember, with great power comes great responsibility.
pages.learn.videos.title: Videos
pages.learn.manuals.title: Manuals
pages.learn.tutorials.quick_start.title: Quickstart guide
pages.learn.tutorials.quick_start.descri: Step by step instructions to get you mapping as fast as possible.
pages.learn.tutorials.tm_manual.title: Tasking Manager User Manual
pages.learn.tutorials.tm_manual.descript: Learn how to find a project and task that interests you, how to lock a task to edit and select the suitable editing software.
pages.learn.tutorials.osm_step_by_step.d: Beginner’s Guide to mapping on OpenStreetMap
pages.learn.tutorials.cheatsheet.title: Tasking Manager Cheatsheet
pages.learn.tutorials.cheatsheet.descrip: TM's concise set of notes used for quick reference
pages.learn.tutorials.learnosm.title: Administration Guide
pages.learn.tutorials.learnosm.descripti: Manual on how to create and manage projects in the Tasking Manager
pages.learn.map.steps.project.title: Select a project
pages.learn.map.steps.project.descriptio: Search through our list of projects for one that meets your interests and fits your skill level.
pages.learn.map.steps.task.title: Select a task
pages.learn.map.steps.task.description: Projects are divided into a set of tasks manageable in size and adapted to your skill level
pages.learn.map.steps.map.title: Map through OpenStreetMap
pages.learn.map.steps.map.description: If you are new to mapping we recommend checking the manuals below before you start mapping.
pages.learn.videos.signup.title: Sign up on Tasking Manager
pages.learn.videos.signup.description: Learn how to Sign Up on Tasking Manager.
pages.learn.videos.map_roads.title: Mapping roads
pages.learn.videos.map_roads.description: Learn how to map roads on OpenStreetMap.
pages.learn.videos.map_buildings.title: Select a task & mapping buildings
pages.learn.videos.map_buildings.descrip: Learn how to map buildings on OpenStreetMap.
pages.learn.validate.video.title: Jinsi ya kuhalalisha
pages.learn.validate.video.description: Learn how to start validating projects on Tasking Manager.
pages.learn.validate.training.video.desc: Deep dive on validation with this training, which includes advanced concepts and the JOSM editor.
pages.learn.validate.intro: Validation is an important part of the process. It requires confidence in your mapping abilities as well as the willingness to help coach and advise newer mappers.
pages.learn.validate.description: Getting a second, third, or fourth pair of eyes on mapped features is an important step for ensuring the quality of the data being added to OpenStreetMap and then used around the world.
pages.learn.validate.steps.identify.titl: Identify if becoming a validator is right for you
pages.learn.validate.steps.identify.desc: Validation requires patience and attention to detail. Some experience mapping in OpenStreetMap is a must, but don’t feel that you need to be an expert to get started.
pages.learn.validate.steps.build.title: Build your skills
pages.learn.validate.steps.build.descrip: Becoming a skilled mapper is crucial to start validating projects. Build up your experience in mapping all kinds of elements. Make sure you are familiar with the {taggingLink}. Eventually check out the JOSM Editor, a customizable editor for OpenStreetMap with a number of tools and plugins to make mapping and validation easier!
pages.learn.validate.steps.collaborate.t: Collaborate as part of the community
pages.learn.validate.steps.collaborate.d: Different validators have different techniques for validating. Join the conversation on the {mailingListLink} or the {forumLink}. Contribute resources that you find helpful and give back to the community!
pages.learn.validate.note: After you become a skilled community mapper in OpenStreetMap, you will get confidence that you are ready to become a validator. You can apply to some of the validation teams or find a project that you want to validate on. Join the team, that will give you permission to validate the tasks. Now this is your opportunity to pay it forward and help other mappers on their journey as well
pages.learn.manage.intro: Being able to organize mapping efforts is a huge opportunity for fast and coordinated data collection. In order to be successful you must be able to motivate a community of mappers.
pages.learn.manage.description: You can use the Tasking Manager to set up your own projects. Be sure to be responsible by making sure your skill level matches your ambition. If you are interested in creating projects please check whether your organization already exists on Tasking Manager by viewing this {organizationsListLink}. If your organization already exists on Tasking Manager please contact one of your listed organization managers. If your organization does not exist, feel free to register your interest in creating projects by completing this {createNewOrganizationFormLink}.
pages.learn.manage.steps.join.title: Become part of a community or organization
pages.learn.manage.steps.join.descriptio: The Tasking Manager allows you to create projects as part of a community or organization. Either get in touch with one you know, or request the admins to add your group to the Tasking Manager.
pages.learn.manage.steps.create.title: Create a project and be loud about it
pages.learn.manage.steps.create.descript: Get people on board to map for your project. We suggest monitoring the mapping on your projects. Make sure to get them properly mapped and completed.
pages.learn.manage.steps.data.title: Use the data
pages.learn.manage.steps.data.descriptio: Download the data and use it for your initial purpose. The {exportToolLink} and the {overpassLink} are excellent to pick the information you need.
pages.quickstart.title: Quickstart guide
pages.quickstart.intro: These step-by-step instructions help you to get started mapping with the Tasking Manager on OpenStreetMap.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep1: Click on the {signUp} button in the upper right corner of the {tmHomepage} homepage.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep1Note: Do you have an OpenStreetMap account already? You can skip ahead to step 4.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep2: Provide your name and email address. We will use this information to guide you through the sign-up process.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep3: A new tab will open allowing you to register on OpenStreetMap.org. Provide your account information and press the {signUp} button at the bottom of the form.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep4: Close the tab and go back to the {tmHomepage}. Click the button to {logIn}.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep5: Select {exploreProjects} in the main navigation to find a project to help map. Or use the link provided by your mapathon instructor.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep6: Read the introduction to the project and click on {contribute} to begin with a mapping task.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep7: Map a randomly selected task for mapping by clicking on the button {mapATask}.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep7Note: Alternatively, you can also select one from the  map or the task and choose “Map selected task”.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep8: This opens the editor; map all the features asked for in the instructions.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep8Note: For more information on mapping in OpenStreetMap please have a look at our tutorials on the {learnPage}.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep9: When finished mapping, save your edits and select the button {submitTask}.
pages.quickstart.quickstartStep9Note: After this, you can go back to step 7 and select a new task for mapping. Thank you for your contribution to OpenStreetMap!
pages.concact.title: Wasiliana Nasi
home.contact.thanksError: Samahani, kulikuwa na shida wakati wa kutuma ujumbe wako.
pages.about.description: The purpose of the Tasking Manager is to divide a large mapping project into smaller tasks that can be completed rapidly and collaboratively, with many people contributing to a collective project goal. The tool shows what needs to be mapped, which areas need to be reviewed and validated for quality assurance and which areas are completed.
pages.about.description2: This approach allows the distribution of tasks to many individual mappers. It also allows monitoring of project progress and helps to improve the consistency of the mapping (e.g. elements to cover, specific tags to use, etc.)
pages.about.OpenStreetMap.description: All work is done through {osmLink}. OpenStreetMap is the community-driven free and editable map of the world, supported by the not-for-profit OpenStreetMap Foundation.
pages.about.OpenStreetMap.wiki: Read more on the {osmWikiLink} or join the discussion with your local OSM community.
pages.about.sustainabilityModel: Access the {faqs} for services and support information.
pages.about.floss.title: Programu ya Bure na Wazi
pages.about.floss.description: The Tasking Manager is Free and Open Source software developed by the {hotLink}. The application’s code can be accessed through {code}, where you can report issues and make contributions.
